# n = int(input())
n = 1098

def f(n):
    n += 1
    while n % 10 == 0:
        n //= 10
    return n

seen = set()
while n not in seen:
    seen.add(n)
    n = f(n)

print(len(seen))

#SOLUTION

n = int(input())

def f(x):
    while x % 10 == 0:
        x //= 10
    return x

res = set()
res.add(n)

while True:
    n = f(n+1)
    if n in res:
        break
    res.add(n)

print(len(res))
